BodyName: Committee on Fire and Emergency Management

Items.Title: Oversight - Evaluating Emergency Service Needs in Response to Population Shifts.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the fire department to report on emergency medical services divisions and stations
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the FDNY to report on emergency medical services divisions and station.

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to requiring the fire department to report on the effect of rezonings between 2002 and 2013 on department resources
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the FDNY to report on the effect of rezonings between 2002 and 2013 on department resources.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the fire department to annually report on the potential impact of certain rezonings on department services
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the FDNY to annually report on the potential impact of certain rezonings on department services.
